1.text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of lights.

4.text: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?

8.text: This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.

12.text: Rejoice always, pray without ceasing, give thanks in all circumstances.

16.text: The Lord is gracious and merciful, slow to anger and abounding in steadfast love.

20.text: I will praise you, for I am fearfully and wonderfully made.

24.text: The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end.

28.text: May the Lord bless you and keep you; may the Lord make his face to shine upon you.

32.text: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

36.text: Be strong and courageous. Do not fear or be in dread, for it is the Lord your God who goes with you.

40.text: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
